actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of the area which was the site of the 1964-65 World's Fair in New York and to include appropriate parts of such area in the Gateway National Recreation Area.
short_title: Gateway National Recreational Area Addition Act

summary.text: Gateway National Recreational Area Addition Act - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to undertake a study of the site of the 1964-1965 New York World's Fair to determine the suitability of such area for inclusion in the Gateway National Recreation Area.

titles.title: Gateway National Recreational Area Addition Act
A bill to provide for a study of the area which was the site of the 1964-65 World's Fair in New York and to include appropriate parts of such area in the Gateway National Recreation Area.
